video.title: Born to Explore
video.synopsis: Host Richard Wiese embarks on spectacular journeys around the globe in this adventurous travel series that will go anywhere for a fascinating story.

episodes.synopsis: In Scotland, Richard dons a kilt to take part in the ancient tradition of the Highland Games, then meets up with a top trainer of Scottish sheepdogs.
episodes.title: Clans and Kilts

episodes.synopsis: In South Africa, Richard encounters 300-pound turtles and endangered penguins who've been given a new lease on life.
episodes.title: Penguins and Turtles

episodes.synopsis: Richard discovers music and dance traditions in cultures around the world, including a Zulu warrior dance and an American Indian buffalo dance.
episodes.title: Rhythms of the World

episodes.synopsis: Richard tours a world of games, racing a camel in Australia's Outback, playing cricket in India and facing a chess master in Chile.
episodes.title: Games People Play

episodes.synopsis: Richard visits an ancient tribe in South Africa, where he eats fried termites and shows how the land has been transformed into a wildlife reserve.
episodes.title: A Village Reborn

episodes.synopsis: Richard explores natural wonders and native culture in the Grand Canyon state, riding the Colorado River's rapids and visiting sacred Navajo land.
episodes.title: Spirit of the Canyons

episodes.synopsis: Richard explores the vibrant colors of India by rickshaw, samples its savory cuisine, takes in a magical seaport and tunes in to yoga and surfing.
episodes.title: Body and Soul

episodes.synopsis: Accompanied by a paleontologist, Richard scours New York City for fossils and finds them in unexpected places, including Grand Central Station.
episodes.title: The Great Fossil Hunt

episodes.synopsis: On the island of Cyprus, Richard joins an archaeological dig for Cleopatra's temple, then meets famous friends in Canada to search for dinosaur bones.
episodes.title: Dig It!

episodes.synopsis: Richard enjoys a culinary journey that includes luau fare in Hawaii, bread baked in volcanic fire and other delicacies cooked beneath the ground.
episodes.title: Earth’s Kitchen

episodes.synopsis: Richard crosses three continents exploring the ties that bind, visiting a Scottish chef, a South African teacher and a Hasidic family in New York.
episodes.title: It's All About Family

episodes.synopsis: In Scotland, Richard encounters the legendary pint-sized Shetland ponies, hikes craggy cliffs that host sea birds and learns to knit a sweater.
episodes.title: Ponies and Puffins

episodes.synopsis: Richard visits the rugged coast of Maine, where he sails with a lobsterman and helps return rescued harbor seal pups to the sea.
episodes.title: A Rugged Beauty

episodes.synopsis: In India, Richard visits the set of a Bollywood movie, tours the silk centers of Kanchipuram and learns why music and dance are viewed as holy arts.
episodes.title: Expressions of Love

episodes.synopsis: In Borneo, Richard boards a klotok boat, journeying deep into the rain forest to encounter orangutans in their endangered environment.
episodes.title: An Orangutan Adventure

episodes.synopsis: In Africa, Richard tracks elusive white rhinos, then joins a group of researchers and scientists dedicated to protecting the creatures from poachers.
episodes.title: The Great Rhino

episodes.synopsis: Richard witnesses a traditional Indonesian dance and explores how Korean and Chinese dances have taken root in America.
episodes.title: A World of Dance

episodes.synopsis: Richard explores the magic of Scotland, joining the search for the Loch Ness monster, playing bagpipes and enjoying marine life and fine cuisine.
episodes.title: Legend & Lore

episodes.synopsis: Richard visits amazing canines around the world, including Scottish sheepdogs, Namibian dogs protecting endangered cheetahs and a heroic pup in Maine.
episodes.title: It’s a Dog’s Life

episodes.synopsis: Richard travels to mystical India to perform a "seva," or good deed, at a Sikh temple, paints sacred elephants and learns about age-old customs.
episodes.title: The Colors of Karma

episodes.synopsis: In the Big Apple, Richard forages for wild edibles in Central Park, traces the trail of the wooly mammoth and enjoys Italian food and opera.
episodes.title: Mammoths on Broadway

episodes.synopsis: In the exotic paradise of Bali, Richard experiences a day in the life of an elephant, participates in a Hindu festival and explores the local arts.
episodes.title: Bali High

episodes.synopsis: Richard joins a horse-packing trek through British Columbia, plays with Shetland ponies, meets a Chilean horse whisperer and encounters a wild herd.
episodes.title: Horse Play

episodes.synopsis: Richard visits the world of artisans who tan Moroccan leather, create Indian beauty oils, spin pottery in Maharajas and craft Chilean horse spurs.
episodes.title: Made by Hand

episodes.synopsis: Richard samples exotic foods that are everyday fare in other cultures, like fried termites, kangaroo tail, boiled snake and sheep intestine.
episodes.title: Strange Food

episodes.synopsis: Richard searches the globe for animals who have survived on Earth for eons, including crocodiles, red wolves and manatees, and meets their protectors.
episodes.title: Ultimate Survivors
